TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit GeneratorPosition extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 可用來描述由 管理之項目的位置。

span.span: is used to describe the position of an item that is managed by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可由 使用。 is used by . ## Examples 下列範例說明如何使用開始向前產生從項目清單的開頭。The following example illustrates how to use to start generating forward from the beginning of an item list. [!code-csharp[GeneratorPositionSnippets#GenerateForwardFromBeginningCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GeneratorPositionSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#generateforwardfrombeginningcode)] [!code-vb[GeneratorPositionSnippets#GenerateForwardFromBeginningCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GeneratorPositionSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#generateforwardfrombeginningcode)] 下列範例說明如何使用開始向後產生的項目清單的結尾。The following example illustrates how to use to start generating backward from the end of an item list. [!code-csharp[GeneratorPositionSnippets#GenerateBackwardFromEndCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GeneratorPositionSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#generatebackwardfromendcode)] [!code-vb[GeneratorPositionSnippets#GenerateBackwardFromEndCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GeneratorPositionSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#generatebackwardfromendcode)] 下列範例說明如何使用開始向前產生中間的項目清單。The following example illustrates how to use to start generating forward from the middle of an item list. [!code-csharp[GeneratorPositionSnippets#GenerateForwardFromMiddleCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GeneratorPositionSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#generateforwardfrommiddlecode)] [!code-vb[GeneratorPositionSnippets#GenerateForwardFromMiddleCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GeneratorPositionSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#generateforwardfrommiddlecode)]

MemberSignature.Value: public GeneratorPosition (int index, int offset);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 index, int32 offset) cil managed
Public Sub New (index As Integer, offset As Integer)
public: GeneratorPosition(int index, int offset);

param.name: index
param.span: 索引，相對於產生的 (實現的) 項目。

span.span: An index that is relative to the generated (realized) items.

param.span: -1 是一個參考項目清單開端或尾端之虛構的特殊值。

span.span: -1 is a special value that refers to a fictitious item at the beginning or the end of the items list.

param.name: offset
param.span: 位移與索引項目附近之未產生的 (未實現的) 項目相關。

span.span: An offset that is relative to the ungenerated (unrealized) items near the indexed item.

param.span: 位移為 0，會參考索引項目本身，位移為 1，會參考下一個未產生的 (未實現的) 項目，而位移為 -1，則參考前一個項目。

span.span: An offset of 0 refers to the indexed element itself, an offset 1 refers to the next ungenerated (unrealized) item, and an offset of -1 refers to the previous item.

summary.span: 使用指定的索引和位移，初始化 的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of with the specified index and offset.

summary.span: 取得或設定與產生的 (實現的) 項目相關的 索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the index that is relative to the generated (realized) items.

value.span: 索引，相對於產生的 (實現的) 項目。

span.span: An index that is relative to the generated (realized) items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks **-1**是指的是虛構項目的開頭或結尾項目清單中的特殊值。**-1** is a special value that refers to a fictitious item at the beginning or the end of the items list.

span.span: Gets or sets the offset that is relative to the ungenerated (unrealized) items near the indexed item.

span.span: An offset that is relative to the ungenerated (unrealized) items near the indexed item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 位移**0**指索引項目本身，位移**1**的位移和下一個未產生 （實現） 項目，是指**-1**指的是上一個項目。An offset of **0** refers to the indexed element itself, an offset **1** refers to the next ungenerated (unrealized) item, and an offset of **-1** refers to the previous item.
